articles.content: Paytm is laying off score of employees after the company has been facing a crisis following RBI's decision to bar several business operations of Paytm Payments Bank. Some employees are being asked to… [+1931 chars]

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: ixigo IPO allotment status out. Latest GMP, how to check application status for Le Travenues Technology shares | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Ixigo IPO allotment status can be checked online through the BSE website and the official portal of IPO registrar. Link Intime India Private Ltd is the Ixigo IPO registrar.
articles.content: Ixigo IPO Allotment: The initial public offering (IPO) of online travel agency Le Travenues Technology Ltd, popularly known by its brand name ixigo, ended on June 12 and received strong subscription.… [+4323 chars]

articles.author: Robert Harvey
articles.title: Oil prices on track for weekly gain on solid demand outlook - Reuters
articles.description: Brent oil futures prices were steady on Friday and on course for their best week in more than four months after solid projections for crude oil and fuel demand.
